SEARCH
Package sh.brane.core.tx

Interface UnsignedTransaction

All Known Implementing Classes:
Eip1559Transaction, Eip4844Transaction, LegacyTransaction
public sealed interface UnsignedTransaction permits LegacyTransaction, Eip1559Transaction, Eip4844Transaction
Unsigned Ethereum transaction.

This is a sealed interface that represents a transaction before it has been signed. Implementations include:

  • LegacyTransaction - EIP-155 transactions with gasPrice
  • Eip1559Transaction - EIP-1559 transactions with dynamic fees
  • Eip4844Transaction - EIP-4844 blob transactions

Usage


 // Create transaction
 UnsignedTransaction tx = new LegacyTransaction(...);

 // Encode for signing
 byte[] preimage = tx.encodeForSigning(chainId);
 byte[] messageHash = Keccak256.hash(preimage);

 // Sign
 Signature signature = privateKey.sign(messageHash);

 // Encode for broadcast
 byte[] envelope = tx.encodeAsEnvelope(signature);
 String hex = Hex.encode(envelope);
Since:
0.2.0

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    byte[]
    encodeAsEnvelope(Signature signature)
    Encodes the signed transaction as a network-ready envelope.
    byte[]
    encodeForSigning(long chainId)
    Encodes the transaction for signing (pre-signature RLP encoding).

  • Method Details

    • encodeForSigning

      byte[] encodeForSigning(long chainId)
      Encodes the transaction for signing (pre-signature RLP encoding).

      For EIP-155 (legacy): RLP([nonce, gasPrice, gasLimit, to, value, data, chainId, 0, 0])
      For EIP-1559: 0x02 || RLP([chainId, nonce, maxPriorityFee, maxFee, gasLimit, to, value, data, accessList])

      Parameters:
      chainId - the chain ID for EIP-155 encoding
      Returns:
      bytes to hash and sign

    • encodeAsEnvelope

      byte[] encodeAsEnvelope(Signature signature)
      Encodes the signed transaction as a network-ready envelope.

      For EIP-155 (legacy): RLP([nonce, gasPrice, gasLimit, to, value, data, v, r, s])
      For EIP-1559: 0x02 || RLP([chainId, nonce, maxPriorityFee, maxFee, gasLimit, to, value, data, accessList, yParity, r, s])

      Parameters:
      signature - the signature to include
      Returns:
      bytes ready for eth_sendRawTransaction
